Hands-on experience is a must.Certification in cloud technologies will be an advantage.Proven experience in a leadership role within the technology domain with a focus on business development, architecture, services and consumption growth.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a track record of successful stakeholder engagement.Ability to analyze complex problems, develop effective solutions, and architect scalable systems.
